definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wink, flash (of eyes) (transp. [text. err. ?] for Ar. ramaza, Aram. [[רְמַז]], rmaz; so NH [[רָמַז]] (rare), [[רֶמֶז]] sign, intimation);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וּמַה־יִּרְזְמוּן עֵינֶיךָ]] Job 15:12 (Codd. [[ירמזון]]) why do thine eyes flash (in wrath)? but possibly read [[יְרוּמוּן]] (Pr 6:17, Pr 30:13, etc., cf. Bu).
